properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters of Northern USVI and Culebra out 10 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 2 at 5:01PM AST until March 4 at 2:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...A northerly swell will continue to invade the local waters...

.Winds and seas will continue to increase with the arrival of a
frontal boundary and a northerly swell. This will create
hazardous seas that will spread across the local waters through at
least Wednesday afternoon.

* WHAT...Increasing seas up to 8 feet with occasional seas up to
10 feet. East to northeast winds up to 20 knots with
occasionally higher gusts.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters of Northern USVI and Culebra out 10 NM.

* WHEN...Until 2 PM AST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be choppy an hazardous to small
craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM AST WEDNESDAY
